pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 30, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for the President of Colombia, Juan Manuel Santos.

Rotunda
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Colombia.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the President of Colombia.

Foyer
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the State Dinner given by Her Excellency The Right Honourable Julie Payette, Governor General of Canada.

Ballroom, Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage only
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:45 p.m.
  • Media accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery must confirm their attendance in advance with the Rideau Hall Press Office. For more information on accreditation, contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery at 613-992-6517.
